seafin.name: Seafin
seafin.tagline: Custom AI for small business. Results in weeks, not months.
seafin.tone: Professional but warm, direct, not corporate. Conversational but knowledgeable.
seafin.audience: SMB owners and CTOs at companies with 10-50 employees
seafin.serviceDescription: AI consulting and custom development for small businesses

solvity.name: Solvity
solvity.tagline: AI automation that works out of the box.
solvity.tone: Friendly, product-focused, value-driven. Approachable and clear.
solvity.audience: SMB operations managers and non-technical buyers
solvity.serviceDescription: self-service AI automation platform for small businesses ($59-299/mo)

custodian.name: Custodian
custodian.tone: Trustworthy, security-focused, reassuring. Calm and authoritative.
custodian.audience: SMB IT managers and compliance officers
